author: markt
msg: Ensure that the close state of a pooled connection and the underlying connection is consistent when the underlying connection is closed as a result of an error condition.

author: astitcher
msg: QPID-5485: If no directory for paging file is enabled print warning (as if
memory mapped files were not supported) but still create a queue.

author: arp
msg: HDFS-5153. Datanode should send block reports for each storage in a separate message. (Arpit Agarwal)
